lines.text: Demetrius! Jason! You've come back at last! I'm so glad to see you!

My dear friends. I've been so bored with these ignorant peasants who are my subjects since you've been away. Oh my god, you can't believe it. So how's Greece? Dish me the dirt on Athens. Tell me what it's like!
Oh, we discuss philosophy and art, and of course like everybody else, we have a little fun.
Ah Greece... where all the Romans go. When they die.
